text:
Évry is a former commune. It is found in the Essonne department in France. On 1 January 2019, it was merged into the new commune of Évry-Courcouronnes.
The university "École nationale supérieure d'informatique pour l'industrie et l'entreprise" and le business school Institut Mines-Télécom Business School are located in the city.

annotations.surface_form: École nationale supérieure d'informatique pour l'industrie et l'entreprise
